title: how to set up a bigchain db setup in a lan
body:
installing of big chain db as mentioned in quick start(docs) is done now

1: how to create a nodes in big chain db one for each system in lan and how to connect them

2: is big chain db accumulate all the results after voting or we need seperate program to do that

3: how to create a asset does it require voting or simple post to api (mentioned in docs ) is enough

4:finally simple flow for the following use case.

asset can be transfered to only some owners. and at a time only one owner should own that asset a time. and only when the asset is disowned by the current owner it can transfer to other (or other way only one owner)
